name: Marshall Fighting Championship
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
What is the project about?
Marshall Fighting Championship, the world's first crypto-powered combat sports promotion. $MFC - Fighting For Fightersâ„¢

What makes your project unique?
The worlds first crypto powered combat sports promotion 

History of your project.
It was created because we saw the MMA fighters were not getting paid well,
then we created the first crypto powered Combat sport project 

Whatâ€™s next for your project?
We have just launched our highly anticipated #NFT staking platform, enabling holders to earn passive income in $MFC tokens ðŸª™

What can your token be used for?
MARSHALL FIGHTING CHAMPIONSHIP, IS THE FIRST EVER FULLY CRYPTO BASED WORLDWIDE COMBAT PROMOTION WHERE FIGHTERS WILL BE PAID IN ETH FROM THE TAXES FROM OUR NATIVE TOKEN $MFC.
